title: BootCamp Mac Pro Drivers for Windows (64bit).
description:
Name: Apple BootCamp Drivers for Windows 64bit
Version:  - 2.0.1

Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: Only the application or game is included

OS version: VISTA 64bit
Processor type(s) & speed: INTEL
RAM minimum: 2G recommended: 4G
Video RAM: 0MB
HD space: 380MB

Link for more information: www.apple.com

These are the BootCamp 2.0-Drivers from Apple including the new 64bit-drivers shipped with the brand new MacPro&#039;s(macbook & macbookpro all works) since january 2008. 

The torrent contains all files on the leopard-installation disk under Drivers. the cool new things are in Apple x64.

It is reported that the 64bit-drivers only work on vista 64bit and not on xp64. 

Sadly there arent&#039;t any apple support-documents or an official download on the apple-site. 

So Useful Drivers, I Request FreeLeech !
